Emilia Clarke confessa de qui era el got de Starbucks que es va colar a 'Joc de trons'
Va ser un dels errors més comentats de l'última temporada de la sèrie

03 Nov 2019, 12:16

L'última temporada de Joc de trons va estar envoltada de polèmica pel seu final, però també per alguns erros que els espectadors van considerar imperdonables. Un d'ells va tenir lloc quan e n una escena del quart episodi de la temporada es va colar un got de Starbucks que trencava amb qualsevol lògica de la sèrie.  En un moment en què Daenerys i la resta dels supervivents d'Hivèrnia estan celebrant que han acabat amb els caminants blancs, es podia veure un got de la cadena nord-americana de cafeteries damunt d'una taula. Tot i que els responsables de la sèrie van demanar disculpes per l'error i van eliminar el got de l'escena posteriorment, mai es va revelar el nom del culpable fins ara. 
Durant una visita a The tonight show with Jimmy Fallon, Emilia Clarke, que a la sèrie interpretava Daenerys Targaryen, ha confessat que per fi ha descobert qui va ser el responsable de l'error. "Fa poc vam fer una festa abans dels Emmy i Conleth [Hill], que interpretava a Varys, i que està assegut al meu costat en aquella escena, se'm va endur i em va dir: «Emilia, t'haig de dir una cosa, estimada. El got de cafè era meu»", explica l'actriu entre riures. Clarke assegura que Hill li va explicar que no havia dit res perquè en aquell moment totes les mirades estaven centrades en ella. 
De fet, el misteri sobre el propietari del got de Starbucks es va convertir en una broma entre els membres del repartiment de Joc de trons. Quan Sophie Turner, que donava vida a Sansa Stark, va visitar el programa de Jimmy Fallon, va assegurar que la culpable de l'error havia sigut Clarke.
text:
Emilia Clarke confesses who the Starbucks glass was to shoot at 'Thrones game'
It was one of the most commented errors of the last season of the series

03 Nov 2019, 12:16

The last game of Thrones game was surrounded by controversy by its end, but also by some mistakes that the spectators considered unforgivable. One of them took place when a scene from the fourth episode of the season sank a Starbucks glass that broke with any logic of the series. At a time when Daenerys and the rest of the survivors of the Wizards are celebrating that they have finished with white walkers, they could see a glass of the American cafe chain on top of a table. Although the makers of the series apologized for the error and removed the glass from the scene later, the name of the culprit was never revealed until now.
During a visit to The tonight show with Jimmy Fallon, Emilia Clarke, who interprets Daenerys Targaryen, she has confessed that she finally discovered who was responsible for the mistake. "We recently did a party before the Emmy and Conleth [Hill], who played Varys, and who is sitting next to me on that scene, he took me and said to me:" Emilia, I must tell you One thing, dear. The glass of coffee was mine, "explains the actress laughing. Clarke says that Hill told him that he had not said anything because at that moment all the eyes were centered on her.
In fact, the mystery about the owner of the Starbucks glass became a joke among the cast members of the Thrones Game. When Sophie Turner, who gave birth to Sansa Stark, visited Jimmy Fallon's program, said the culprit for the mistake was Clarke.
